pr_title: Add internal testing option to exit JVM on advice failure

timeline.bodyText: Should this be a more interesting exit code than just 1?
timeline.author: tylerbenson

replies.bodyText: Have you anything special in mind? I picked 1 since it's defined as Catchall for general errors.
replies.author: bantonsson

replies.bodyText: Yeah, I understand.  I was just thinking if a program exits with code 1, it can be sometimes tricky to identify the cause.  That said, I don't have strong feelings about this either way.
replies.author: tylerbenson

replies.bodyText: I'll leave it as 1 for now. It's just a means to forcefully fail someone else's test if we throw inside an advice.
replies.author: bantonsson

timeline.message: Add internal testing option to exit JVM on advice failure

timeline.bodyText: Where do you intend to enable this config?
timeline.author: tylerbenson

replies.bodyText: In the test harness of the other project that I'm testing, to make sure that the types of issues that I first missed while running the play tests will fail the test suite.
replies.author: bantonsson
